txt.en:
'Indeed, we were fortunate that all that the Company left behind was a cooking pot, but I fear for the carelessness of the halflings. I am not sure that they yet understand fully that their quest is not a mere stroll in the wilderness.

'Nevertheless, it is our lot to make sure the Enemy does not learn more of the Company or its quest. To this end, I would have you go to Echad Dúnann, some distance to the south-east of here, and speak with Rinneldor.

'Tell him all that has transpired and serve him as best you may.'
'Welcome to Echad Dúnann, [placeholder]. I welcome your news, though it troubles me as well.\n\n'Stay a while... we have much to discuss.'
'Hurry now to Echad Dúnann and speak with Rinneldor. The encampment lies to the south-east.'
You recovered the item taken from the Company's camp-site, which turned out to be naught but a cooking pot, but Golgallon fears other more revealing signs may have been left.
Talk to Rinneldor at Echad Dúnann

Rinneldor is at Echad Dúnann, some distance to the south-east of Echad Eregion.\n\nGolgallon has asked you to speak with Rinneldor regarding the movements of the Company and the discoveries you have made.
